DOC.brief_summary: This study prospectively enrol adolescent idiopathic scoliosis ( AIS ) patient try find age impact surgical outcome AIS .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Age Surgical Outcome Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis
DOC.criteria: Adolescent idiopathic scoliosis patient ; undergo posterior correction surgery ; minimum 5 year followup ; fullspine radiography . spinal tumor ; hip disease ; without quality life measurement .
